item.title: Laura add a quote by Leonard Cohen
item.description: "even damnation is poisoned with rainbows." -- Leonard Cohen

item.title: Laura add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "All that is sacred and taboo in the world are meaningless." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Laura add a quote by tom waits
item.description: "slept all night in the cedar grove, i was born to ramble, born to rove, some men are searchin' for the holy grail, but there ain't nothin' sweeter than ridin' the rails" -- tom waits

item.title: Laura add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "like two r's trapped in a spanish songbook, tilli and max lurked in their shoebox castle, waiting to be rolled." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Laura add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "there are worse things than being alone but it often takes decades to realize this and most often when you do it's too late and there's nothing worse than too late" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Happiness consists in realizing it is all a great strange dream" -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Laura add a quote by Wayne Dyer
item.description: "You have everything you need for complete peace and total happiness right now." -- Wayne Dyer

item.title: Laura add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Simply because we were licked a hundred years before we started is no reason for us not to try to win." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Laura add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Real courage is when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Laura add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Miss Jean Louise, stand up. Your father's passin'." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Laura add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "There are just some kind of men…who’re so busy worrying about the next world they’ve never learned to live in this one." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Laura add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "As a reader I loathe introductions...Introductions inhibit pleasure, they kill the joy of anticipation, they frustrate curiosity." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Laura add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "She seemed glad to see me when I appeared in the kitchen, and by watching her I began to think there was some skill involved in being a girl." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Laura add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Things are always better in the morning." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Laura add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description:
"I don't want to hear any words like that while I'm here. Scout, you'll get in trouble if you go around saying things like that. You want to grow up to be a lady, don't you?'
I said not particularly." -- Harper Lee
